S203A.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR 1ST SERGEANT 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 5. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S203A.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 10. 30-34 11. 35 AND OVER 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q8. ABOUT HOW OFTEN, WHEN YOU DO READ "THE STARS AND STRIPES", DO YOU READ THE PICTURE EDITORIALS?  1. READ IT EVERY TIME I READ THE PAPER 2. READ IT MOST OF THE TIMES I READ THE PAPER 3. READ IT ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. JUST READ IT ONCE IN A WHILE 5. SELDOM OR NEVER READ IT 0. NO ANSWER P. THE SPACE AVAILABLE IN "THE STARS AND STRIPES" IS STRICTLY LIMITED. IN ANSWERING THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS YOU SHOULD BEAR IN MIND THAT IF MORE SPACE IS GIVEN TO SOME THINGS, OTHERS WILL HAVE TO GET LESS SPACE THAN THEY DO NOW.

S203A.Q11. HOW WELL DOES "THE STARS AND STRIPES" COVER THE SPORTS NEWS YOU PERSONALLY ARE INTERESTED IN?  1. IT COVERS IT VERY WELL 2. IT COVERS IT FAIRLY WELL 3. IT DOES NOT COVER IT AT ALL WELL 4. I AM NOT ESPECIALLY INTERESTED IN SPORTS 0. NO ANSWER

S203A.Q12A. IN YOUR OPINION, WHAT IS THE MAIN PURPOSE OF "THE STARS AND STRIPES"*  1. TO FURNISH SOLDIERS WITH ENTERTAINING READING MATTER 2. TO GIVE SOLDIERS THE NEWS AS IT HAPPENS 3. TO TRY TO GET SOLDIERS TO BELIEVE THINGS THE ARMY WANTS THEM TO BELIEVE 4. SOMETHING ELSE 0. NO ANSWER

S203A.Q12B. DO YOU THINK "THE STARS AND STRIPES" HAS ANY OTHER PURPOSE IN ADDITION TO THE ONE YOU CHECKED AS THE MAIN PURPOSE?  1. NO 2. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q13. IN GENERAL, WHEN YOU READ THE PICTURE EDITORIAL IN "THE STARS AND STRIPES", DO YOU READ ALL THE WAY THROUGH IT OR DO YOU JUST SKIP THROUGH AND READ PART OF IT?  1. I SELDOM OR NEVER READ THE PICTURE EDITORIAL AT ALL 2. I USUALLY READ ALL THE WAY THROUGH IT 3. I USUALLY READ MOST OF IT 4. I USUALLY JUST SKIP THROUGH IT 0. NO ANSWER

I DISLIKE MOST OF THEM, BUT LIKE SOME OF THEM 5. I DISLIKE ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. I DON'T HAVE ANY PARTICULAR FEELING ABOUT THEM ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q16. DO YOU DISCUSS THE DAILY PICTURE EDITORIALS WITH OTHER SOLDIERS?  1. WE VERY OFTEN TALK THEM OVER 2. WE TALK THEM OVER FAIRLY OFTEN 3. WE OCCASIONALLY TALK THEM OVER 4. WE ALMOST NEVER TALK THEM OVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q17A. HAVE YOU CUT OUT ANY OF THE PICTURE EDITORIALS TO SEND HOME?  1. YES, I HAVE CUT OUT SEVERAL TO SEND HOME 2. YES, I HAVE CUT OUT ONE OR TWO 3. NO, I HAVE NOT CUT OUT ANY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q17B. HAVE YOU SENT HOME ANY COPIES OF "THE STARS AND STRIPES"*  1. I HAVE SENT HOME PRACTICALLY EVERY ISSUE 2. I HAVE SENT HOME QUITE A FEW ISSUES 3. I HAVE SENT HOME ONE OCCASIONALLY 4. I HAVE NEVER SENT ANY ISSUES HOME 0. NO ANSWER

S203A.Q18. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW IMPORTANT ARE THE KINDS OF THINGS THEY WRITE ABOUT IN THE PICTURE EDITORIALS?  1. I SELDOM OR NEVER READ THE PICTURE EDITORIALS 2. THEY ARE USUALLY VERY IMPORTANT 3. THEY ARE USUALLY FAIRLY IMPORTANT 4. THEY ARE USUALLY NOT VERY IMPORTANT 5. THEY ARE USUALLY NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q19. IN YOUR OPINION, SHOULD "THE STARS AND STRIPES" CARRY EDITORIALS?  1. YES, "THE STARS AND STRIPES" SHOULD CARRY EDITORIALS 2. NO, "THE STARS AND STRIPES" SHOULD NOT CARRY EDITORIALS 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME WHETHER THEY CARRY EDITORIALS OR NOT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q20. WOULD YOU RATHER HAVE ANOTHER CARTOON IN "THE STARS AND STRIPES" INSTEAD OF THE PICTURE EDITORIAL?  1. I WOULD RATHER HAVE THE PICTURE EDITORIAL 2. I WOULD RATHER HAVE ANOTHER CARTOON 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q21. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE STYLE OR WAY IN WHICH THE PICTURE EDITORIALS ARE WRITTEN?  1. I HAVEN'T READ THE PICTURE EDITORIALS ENOUGH TO SAY 2. I LIKE THE MAN-TO-MAN WAY IN WHICH THEY ARE WRITTEN 3. I DISLIKE THE WAY IN WHICH THEY WRITE DOWN TO MEN 4. SOME OTHER IDEA 0. NO ANSWER
S203A.Q22. EVERYTHING CONSIDERED, HOW WOULD YOU RATE "THE STARS AND STRIPES"*  1. EXCELLENT 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. NO SO GOOD 5. QUITE POOR 0. NO ANSWER

S203A.Q23A. IN YOUR OPINION, DOES "THE STARS AND STRIPES" MAKE MISTAKES IN TELLING ABOUT WAR NEWS?  1. IT OFTEN MAKES MISTAKES 2. IT MAKES MISTAKES ONCE IN A WHILE 3. IT ALMOST NEVER MAKES MISTAKES 4. DON'T KNOW WHETHER IT MAKES MISTAKES OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 23B NOT CODED.

S203A.Q24. WHAT KIND OF A PICTURE DO YOU THINK "THE STARS AND STRIPES" GIVES ON HOW THE WAR IS GOING?  1. IT GIVES THE IDEA THAT THE WAR IS GOING BETTER THAN IT REALLY IS 2. IT GIVES THE IDEA THAT THE WAR IS GOING WORSE THAN IT REALLY IS 3. IT GIVES ABOUT THE RIGHT IDEA OF HOW THE WAR IS GOING 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT A PARTICULAR EDITORIAL WHICH APPEARED IN "STARS AND STRIPES" ON DECEMBER 14, 1944 UNDER THE TITLE "LET'S LOOK AT THE RECORD".
S203A.Q1. DID YOU READ THIS EDITORIAL WHEN IT APPEARED IN "THE STARS AND STRIPES"*  1. NOT SURE WHETHER I READ IT OR NOT 2. YES, I READ IT 3. NO, I DID NOT READ IT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203A.Q3A. IN GENERAL, DO YOU LIKE OR DISLIKE THIS EDITORIAL?  1. LIKE IT VERY MUCH 2. LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. DON'T PARTICULARLY LIKE IT OR DISLIKE IT 4. DISLIKE IT PRETTY MUCH 5. DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER
S203A.Q3B. ARE THERE ANY PARTICULAR THINGS ABOUT IT OR THE WAY IT IS PRESENTED THAT YOU LIKE?  1. NO 2. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
